features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Supabase-based authentication system with login/logout functionality

features.name: Onboarding System
features.description: Multi-step onboarding wizard for new users to set test date, preferences, and accommodations

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing study progress, countdown to test date, and daily tasks

features.name: Daily Study Plan
features.description: 11-day structured curriculum with daily lessons for Math and English

features.name: Question System
features.description: Practice questions, quizzes, and drills with scoring and progress tracking

features.name: Diagnostic Assessment
features.description: Full diagnostic tests to assess current skill levels and generate study plans

features.name: Simulation Tests
features.description: Full-length ACT practice tests with timer and scoring

features.name: Cheatsheets
features.description: Reference materials for each ACT subject area

features.name: Parent Portal
features.description: Parent/guardian access to student progress and reports

features.name: Admin Features
features.description: Administrative tools for importing questions and managing content

features.name: Progress Tracking
features.description: Track study progress, wrong answers, and weak areas

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Error boundaries and error handling throughout the application

features.name: Loading States
features.description: Loading spinners and skeleton components for better UX

features.name: Offline Support
features.description: Offline queue system for handling network interruptions

features.name: Accommodations
features.description: Support for test accommodations like extended time
